text: visvasigale, nivu sada allahanigagi n'yayada para saksi nilluvavaragiri. Ondu janangada melina hagetana kuda, n'yaya palisade iralu nim'mannu pracodisa baradu. Nivu sada n'yayavanne palisiri. Aduve dharmanisthege heccu nikata dhoraneyagide. Sada allahanige anjiri. Allahanantu, nivu maduttiruva ellavannu cennagi aritiruttane
